name: Fogvill: Amusement Park of the Dead
name_original: Fogvill: Amusement Park of the Dead
description: In "Fogvill: Amusement Park of the Dead" you're dropped into a mysterious medival themepark overrun by hordes of zombies. Fight your way through different areas, collecting coins and items along the way as you enter deeper into the amusement park and find out its secrets along the way.
